vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Descargué {{una aplicación}} para aprender español.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I downloaded an application to learn Spanish.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Ella toma fotos con {{su cámara digital}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: She takes photos with her digital camera.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi programa favorito está en {{el canal}} cinco.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My favorite show is on channel five.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito encontrar {{el cargador}} de mi teléfono.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to find my phone charger.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Voy al {{cibercafé}} para usar el internet.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I go to the cybercafe to use the internet.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: ¿Dónde está {{el control remoto}} del televisor?
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: Where is the TV remote control?

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Dejé un mensaje en {{tu correo de voz}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I left a message on your voicemail.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Puse mi canción favorita en {{el estéreo}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I played my favorite song on the stereo.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi teléfono tiene {{una pantalla táctil}} muy sensible.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My phone has a very sensitive touchscreen.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Escuchamos música en {{el radio}} del coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We listen to music on the car radio.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Perdí {{mi celular}} ayer.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I lost my cell phone yesterday.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Compré {{una tableta}} para leer libros electrónicos.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I bought a tablet to read electronic books.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: {{El televisor}} está en la sala de estar.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The television is in the living room.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Voy a {{apagar}} la computadora antes de dormir.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am going to turn off the computer before sleeping.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi teléfono no {{funciona}} bien hoy.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My phone is not working well today.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Voy a {{llamar}} a mi amigo con mi celular.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am going to call my friend with my cell phone.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Puedes {{poner}} música en el estéreo.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: You can turn on music on the stereo.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito {{prender}} la luz para leer.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to turn on the light to read.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: El teléfono está {{sonando}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The phone is ringing.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi computadora está {{descompuesta}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My computer is broken.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Este programa está muy {{lento}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: This program is very slow.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: El disco duro está {{lleno}} de archivos.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The hard drive is full of files.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Los amigos se {{abrazan}} para saludarse.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: Friends hug each other to greet.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Es importante {{ayudarse}} mutuamente.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: It is important to help each other.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Se vieron y se {{besaron}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: They saw each other and kissed.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Nos vamos a {{encontrar}} en el parque.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We are going to meet at the park.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Siempre nos {{saludamos}} con una sonrisa.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We always greet each other with a smile.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Guardé {{el archivo}} en mi computadora.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I saved the file on my computer.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi dirección de correo electrónico tiene una {{arroba}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My email address has an at sign (@).

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Escribí un artículo para {{mi blog}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I wrote an article for my blog.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Utilizo un {{buscador}} para encontrar información en Internet.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I use a search engine to find information on the Internet.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi {{computadora portátil}} es muy rápida.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My laptop is very fast.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: La {{conexión inalámbrica}} en esta cafetería es excelente.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The wireless connection in this coffee shop is excellent.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Te enviaré el documento a tu {{dirección electrónica}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I will send the document to your email address.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito {{la impresora}} para imprimir mi tarea.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need the printer to print my homework.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Busco toda mi información en {{Internet}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I search all my information on the Internet.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Recibí un {{mensaje de texto}} importante.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I received an important text message.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: El {{monitor}} de mi computadora es muy grande.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The monitor of my computer is very large.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Configuré mi {{página principal}} para mostrar las noticias.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I set my home page to show the news.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: La {{pantalla}} de mi teléfono está rota.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The screen of my phone is broken.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Instalé un nuevo {{programa de computación}} para editar fotos.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I installed a new computer program to edit photos.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi {{ratón}} no funciona correctamente.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My mouse is not working properly.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi computadora está conectada a {{la red}} de la oficina.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My computer is connected to the office network.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Encontré una receta en un {{sitio web}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I found a recipe on a website.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: El {{teclado}} de mi computadora es cómodo para escribir.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The keyboard of my computer is comfortable for typing.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito {{borrar}} algunos archivos viejos.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to delete some old files.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Suelo {{chatear}} con mis amigos en línea.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I usually chat with my friends online.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Voy a {{descargar}} música nueva esta noche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am going to download new music tonight.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Debo {{escanear}} unos documentos para el trabajo.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have to scan some documents for work.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: {{Grabaré}} el concierto con mi cámara.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I will record the concert with my camera.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Siempre {{guardo}} mi trabajo antes de cerrar la computadora.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I always save my work before closing the computer.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo que {{imprimir}} mi tarea para la clase.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have to print my homework for the class.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Me gusta {{navegar}} en Internet en mi tiempo libre.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I like to browse the Internet in my free time.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Manejamos por {{la autopista}} para llegar más rápido.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We drive on the highway to get there faster.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: La {{carretera}} está cerrada por construcción.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The road is closed for construction.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Ponemos las maletas en {{el baúl}} del coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We put the suitcases in the trunk of the car.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi casa está en esta {{calle}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My house is on this street.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo que abrir {{el capo}} para revisar el motor.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have to open the hood to check the engine.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Hay herramientas en {{el cofre}} del carro.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: There are tools in the trunk of the car.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: {{El carro}} de Juan es muy rápido.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: Juan's car is very fast.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Compré {{un coche}} nuevo el mes pasado.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I bought a new car last month.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: La {{circulación}} está muy lenta hoy.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The traffic is very slow today.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Evito {{el tráfico}} saliendo temprano.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I avoid traffic by leaving early.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Guardo mi bicicleta en {{el garaje}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I keep my bike in the garage.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Llevé mi coche al {{taller}} para una revisión.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I took my car to the workshop for a check-up.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito poner {{gasolina}} en el coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to put gasoline in the car.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Hay una {{gasolinera}} en la próxima salida de la autopista.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: There is a gas station at the next highway exit.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo que renovar mi {{licencia de conducir}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have to renew my driver's license.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Una de las {{llantas}} del carro está desinflada.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: One of the car's tires is flat.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: {{El mecánico}} reparó los frenos de mi coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The mechanic repaired the brakes of my car.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Estoy estudiando {{mecánica}} para arreglar mi propio coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am studying mechanics to fix my own car.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Usé {{el navegador GPS}} para encontrar la dirección.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I used the GPS navigator to find the address.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Hay una grieta en {{el parabrisas}} de mi coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: There is a crack in my car's windshield.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: La {{policía}} estaba dirigiendo el tráfico.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The police were directing the traffic.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Siempre respeto {{la velocidad máxima}} en la autopista.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I always respect the speed limit on the highway.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo que ajustar {{el volante}} antes de conducir.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to adjust the steering wheel before driving.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo problemas para {{arrancar}} el coche en las mañanas.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have trouble starting the car in the mornings.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Necesito {{arreglar}} el motor de mi coche.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I need to fix my car's engine.

vocabulary.english: to get off, to get out of
vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Me voy a {{bajar}} del autobús en la próxima parada.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am going to get off the bus at the next stop.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Mi hermano aprendió a {{conducir}} a los diecisiete años.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: My brother learned to drive at seventeen.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Prefiero {{manejar}} a lugares cercanos.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I prefer to drive to nearby places.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Es difícil {{estacionar}} en el centro de la ciudad.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: It's difficult to park in the city center.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Tengo que {{llenar el tanque}} de gasolina antes de viajar.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I have to fill the gas tank before traveling.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: El autobús va a {{parar}} en todas las estaciones.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: The bus is going to stop at all the stations.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Debo {{revisar el aceite}} del coche cada mes.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I should check the car's oil every month.

vocabulary.english: to get on, to get into
vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Me voy a {{subir}} al tren en la próxima parada.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I am going to get on the train at the next stop.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Creo que el restaurante está {{por aquí}}.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I think the restaurant is around here.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: Hay muchas frutas tropicales, {{por ejemplo}}, el mango y la piña.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: There are many tropical fruits, for example, mango and pineapple.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: No estudiamos, {{por eso}} no pasamos el examen.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: We did not study, that's why we didn't pass the exam.

vocabulary.example_sentence_spanish: {{Por fin}} terminé mis tareas.
vocabulary.example_sentence_english: I finally finished my homework.
